title: Fears grow for Ukrainian civilians after checkpoint is shelled and evacuations fail for a second day
content:
1. Fears grow for Ukrainian civilians after checkpoint is shelled and evacuations fail for a second day  CNN
  2. At Least 3 Civilians Killed in Shelling by Russian Forces Near Kyiv  The New York Times
  3. Journalists, locals run from heavy shelling in Ukraine's Irpin  Reuters
  4. Russian Artillery Kills Ukrainian Civilians Fleeing Kyiv Suburb  The Wall Street Journal
  5. Heavy shelling is heard west and northwest of Kyiv, as two children are reported dead  CNN
contentSnippet:
Fears grow for Ukrainian civilians after checkpoint is shelled and evacuations fail for a second day  CNN
At Least 3 Civilians Killed in Shelling by Russian Forces Near Kyiv  The New York Times
Journalists, locals run from heavy shelling in Ukraine's Irpin  Reuters
Russian Artillery Kills Ukrainian Civilians Fleeing Kyiv Suburb  The Wall Street Journal
Heavy shelling is heard west and northwest of Kyiv, as two children are reported dead  CNN

localize.title: チェックポイントが砲撃され、2日目の避難が失敗し、ウクライナの市民の不安が高まっています。
チェックポイントが砲撃され、2日目の避難が失敗し、ウクライナの市民の不安が高まっています。
检查站遭炮击后，乌克兰平民的担忧加剧，撤离行动连续两天失败
